text: The Swimming Pool () is a 2012 Cuban art house film directed by Carlos M. Quintela and produced by Cuban-Canadian filmmaker Sebastian Barriuso. The film premiered at the 2012 Havana Film Festival, and later showed at the 2013 Berlin International Film Festival as part of the Panorama Special section. It was described as "contemplative and enigmatic" by Deborah Young of The Hollywood Reporter. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2012 films Category:Cuban films
title: The Swimming Pool (2012 film)
